#Wet lab-potential errors

    - Sample switching
    - Mislabeled initially
    - Any sample transfer is a chance for tube switching
    - Wrong index used in PCR
- Contamination
    - At time of collection 
    - Sample transfer
    - Extraction
    - PCR
